subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Although the Patriots are tied with the Jets and the Dolphins for first place in the A.F.C. East, their easier path to the playoffs is the wild card, although they need help there, too.
snippet: Although the Patriots are tied with the Jets and the Dolphins for first place in the A.F.C. East, their easier path to the playoffs is the wild card, although they need help there, too.
